website_summaries.verdict: Great entry-level introduction to Japanese-style bento boxes. Microwave and dishwasher safe, and very compact for storage.
pros: Other matching components available, such as cups and utensils
cons: Some design issues, including leakage and mediocre seals
Fit between top and bottom compartments not secure

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay together or keep food separated
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of this lunch box. First of all, it's really hard to keep together and definitely not leak-proof. The top has two compartments and the food WILL spill between the two. I hate the strap and would prefer a latch. Once you slide the strap off everything just falls apart. My kids now use it as a bath toy and I have bought something else. Waste of money. I DO love the Bentgo kids lunch boxes, so not all of their products are this bad!
customer_reviews.author: T. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Bentgo Stackable Lunch Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this All-in-One Stackable Lunch Box for my 4 years old. I needed a Lunchbox with a couple of sections meant for Multiple Snacks/Fruits/Veggies/Eggs and ever since I bought this Lunch Box, packing Snacks and lunch is pretty much easy and managed. With two sections on the Top box and bottom one with No section makes it easy for me to Mix N Match Her favorite Food items. Do keep in mind that the boxes are not leak-proof, meaning anyone looking for a leak-proof lunch box, this product might not work for you. Albeit The boxes are Top Rack Dishwasher-Safe I prefer to wash them manually for washing them in The dishwasher may deteriorate the quality oftentimes.
customer_reviews.author: AAR.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage! Please read!
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute idea for my two preschoolers for sending snacks to school. However... the lids do NOT really close (you have to use the elastic band, which you know is getting lost within a few weeks), and the sides leak into eachother. The kids complained that the grapes made their crackers soggy. That should not happen in a divided container- it’s not even liquid!! The other container without the divider doesn’t firmly close either. Such a strange design! Oh and I bought the little sauce cups- they are so small, really too small, and they do NOT fit inside either of the bigger containers - the lid will not shut with the sauce cup in there. Total garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: This product would be sooo much better if they snapped together tightly and had a snap open instead of the band that connects them. It’s not really secure because the lids don’t snap together and I would never use any kind of liquid in these containers but I like that it’s neat and tidy looking and portion size is good. I put baked ziti and a roll in bottom container and 2 snacks in the divided container..
customer_reviews.author: Mindday

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold together as well as you’d like
customer_reviews.text: The portion sizing is great, and the dishwasher friendly is a big plus, but overall I would not buy this again. While The compartments nestle together, the only thing truly keeping this shut is the elastic band. It doesn’t inspire great confidence to keep altogether. The silverware included is okay, but small, and I can’t ever seem to fit them properly into the lid, which doesn’t help with the overall dilemma of keeping the box shut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy. Use it every day for work. Keeps everything in, doesn't leak, and your food's smell doesn't come out until you open it. The box is microwave safe and quite big, despite its compact design. highly recommend it if you enjoy taking your lunch with you. The fact is bright and colorful only makes it more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Taisiya N.

customer_reviews.title: Not for use with children or food with moisture....
customer_reviews.text: Bottom half is not leak proof and has no seal between the lid and box. Dry use only. Top half is more or less leak proof as the lid has a seal.... but warps over time and is difficult to stack and the divider between the two sections does not have a sealing surface sooooo... the contents can transfer between the two sides. The elastic band is non-adjustable and doesn’t hold well... if you want a mess to clean then yes I recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Practical, could use minor improvements
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time looking for the ideal bento box to take to work, and this is definitely the best one I found. Even though it looks small, the portion sizes are pretty decent. Having a divider that holds the cutlery is extremely useful. The only thing that needs improvement for me is that the top container does not clip into place on top of the divider; that is, what keeps everything together is the included strap. Also, this is not a leak proof container, so mind that.
customer_reviews.author: Beebee

customer_reviews.title: Great value...love these!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got two of the grey Bentgo boxes...four of the cups...and some of the little sauce cups. I really love them! I like the idea of putting in some extra effort to make a nice lunch. Actually I like to prepare a few at time, so I'm ready! A fun and practical container system makes my lunch something special to look forward to. They are nicely made, and thoughtfully designed. I like that they store smaller and can be used in different ways. I wish you had a 2-3 ounce sauce cup for salad dressing and vegetable dipping. I'd rate these a 5...especially for the great value.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality..can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these in gray and white. Perfect size for lunches. My son takes it to work every day. Heats up the hot food in one part, the other part he uses for the cold stuff. They don't stain, lose shape, or get damaged in the microwave. Remember - never put either lid in the nuker, though. The elastic band has never stretched out, and holds the compartments together snugly. We couldn't be happier with them.
customer_reviews.author: ChattyCat

customer_reviews.title: Not leakproof. Design flaw as well.
customer_reviews.text: Mine isn't leak proof sadly, I ended up with teriyaki sauce on the floor of my car. (Was eating lunch in my car and forgot to zip the lunch bag i bought and the bentgo fell out on the floor when I started driving. The other thing is that the divider on the top is basically worthless if you want to keep the two foods separate because if you do so much as tilt the bentgo you end up with a mix of snacks on top.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: It can leak, utensils are not good, microwave safe, looks great.
customer_reviews.text: All in all, I loved this lunch box, but after a few years of using it, I think it's time for a review. Pros: - Stacks well and looks stylish - Convenient strap keeps it all together - Compartmental so you can have your food separated nicely - Affordable - Quality plastic and microwave safe Cons: - It will leak - The included plastic utensils do not work well at all - Does not clean easy - Even with strap on boxes will slide - Strap wears out over the years All in all, I would still recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Leaky & Small
customer_reviews.text: These have ruined multiple of my lunches due to them leaking. Don't even dare think about putting some liquid food (e.g., applesauce) in this lunch box because chances are, if the container even tips the slightest, it will get into the other half of the box resulting in a disgusting mixture resembling the aftermath of your visit to Taco Bell. Also, these are pretty damn small—like Trump's-hands small. I recommend just getting some larger Rubbermaid containers that actually seal.
customer_reviews.author: Zavage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the bentgo box. I like how light it is for transportation, easy to clean, and save a lot of space when done with lunch or organizing it. I use it for my husband and for my kid (before I bought the kids bentgo). I attached some photos of how I used it. And of course, I will rate it 5 stars!.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar L.

customer_reviews.title: I like it  a lot, but...
customer_reviews.text: For the most part I do like this a lot. Iike the sizes of compartments, it is nice and compact, but still holds a nice lunch, it is attractive and easy to use. My qualm with it is that I have had the top tier slip off and part of my lunch fell into my lunch bag. I'll keep using it, and I like it. But I was disapointed in it that day
customer_reviews.author: OMEvans

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: These have no seal. You have to depend on the flimsy band to hold it all together. The top part with two sections is not fully divided, so things get all mixed. I love this brand, but am so disappointed in this quality. Straight into the trash for us. Note- I didn’t drop this bag or anything. It opened just carrying it in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Walker

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids school lunches, and was not thrilled. They do hold several things well, but the whole thing is bulky and doesn't fit well in some lunch bags. They are also pretty difficult for younger kids to use. They tend to struggle on keeping the pieces together since they are help together with basically a big elastic band. Will not purchase these again! Not for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin S

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Wish it locked....
customer_reviews.text: Definitely very cute! I like that it's compact with 3 compartments (total). It's great for portion sizes for my lunch at work and I won't forget my utensils, anymore. Dislike: the only thing I wish would be better is if the containers would click/lock into place. They're too loose for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right size for a lunch or large snack. A club roll was too thick to fit comfortably in the lower portion and had to be wrapped in plastic wrap to keep it fresh, then squashed into the container. The utensils are good, heavy duty quality and wear well. I like that the strap can be used in either direction depending on whether you use one or both levels of the container. The number of color choices was a great feature also.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Love

customer_reviews.title: Alllllmost perfect
customer_reviews.text: My coworkers were getting annoyed with all of the large lunchbags in the fridge so I wanted something compact and self contained. This was the perfect solution. It has a lot of room and options for space which I love. I wish the containers were just slightly taller because I do have to squish my things in order for them to fit. The silverware is a nice touch but they also aren't great. The fork isn't pointed at all so I basically have to use it as a spoon and my spoon doesnt click in so it isn't secure. All in all I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for another brand I had got for my daughters lunch box, and this one is so much better. I love that it is held together by the elastic because it is easier for her to open. The storage room in this is huge! My only complaint is the top lid is a little tough but I’m sure it’ll wear down with time
customer_reviews.author: Allison Smith

customer_reviews.title: More cute than useful
customer_reviews.text: I’m sad I didn’t read the reviews before purchasing. This box looks nice, but it’s not functional at all. The boxes and lids don’t seal, so expect food to go stale. If you’re not careful opening it, box parts, kids, and food goes everywhere. The strap is mandatory since nothing clicks together. I was really excited about this product, but I’m really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: amanda benson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect-o
customer_reviews.text: I was carrying around several containers until I landed on this. It is perfect for portions. It seals tightly. I purchased the green one and it looks lovely. It makes lunch time simple and easy. It also cuts down on the morning rush of putting so many things in containers. I plan to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: KiBROWS

customer_reviews.title: FInally, a Lunchbox for adults - GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: Forget all the one use containers, forget the plastic boxes with lids that stick out, this is the BEST stackable lunchbox I have ever used. The bottom is large enough for a sandwich or pasta or something else. Great space to have a full sized meal. Comes with all utensils! top is divided-- I usually put veggies in here with a small container of dip-- for a mid afternoon snack at work. The strap holds everything nice and snug-- and the BEST thing is that you can use the strap alone on either portion, or use both stackables together.
customer_reviews.author: ALP

customer_reviews.title: great for preschool kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddlers lunch for preschool and it works great. I love that it separates and you can only warm the bottom without taking food out. Then they just eat out of the bottom tray. I really don't like those other lunch boxes where you have to take out the food to warm it up. This removes that problem and that way preschool workers don't touch my sons food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not seal, top half falls off
customer_reviews.text: This is a below average bento. I've purchased several multi level bentos for myself and daughter in the past with no problems or complaints. This was for my husband for work. The pieces do not fit together well and after several washes the middle separator warps and trying to fit the parts together again is imprecise at best. There is no hope at a seal for wet ingredients but the whole thing falls apart. We purchased in two colours and this has happened to both boxes. I am replacing the boxes this year and will be choosing a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: J. Slomka

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I knew I was going to like this before I ordered it but man, it’s even better than I expected. I needed something like this to help me keep my food organized when going to work, and I was glad that it wasn’t too big or too small either. So so happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Simple and convenient design for non-liquid foods
customer_reviews.text: These work well for bringing a middle-sized portion of non-liquid food to the office. Easy to clean. Safe in the top rack of the dishwasher. They are light-weight; the elastic band keeps the two compartments together; so they are easy to carry in a tote bag or backpack.
customer_reviews.author: tr888

customer_reviews.title: Small containers, don’t lock together : they just sit on top of each other and tie together!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot smaller then I thought it would be . The lids do not lock into place - I find that extremely frustrating , it leaks, if it wasn’t for the tie it would be utterly useless. Over all it’s ehhh. Just really disappointed. Not what I expect. I have quite a few different bentgo containers and I love them . I have of the The salad container , they are great ! Lids lock - larger container. my husband and I love them . Have a few of the kid ones to. They are wonderful !!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Best Lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: I have been through a lot of lunch boxes and this is prob my favorite. It's perfect for packing my toddler's lunch and easy to clean and assemble. If you're a parent sending it with your child to school, my recommendation would be to label all the parts, haha!
customer_reviews.author: TheGummyMummy

customer_reviews.title: An ideal lunch container, compact and versatile, with everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great container for taking home cooked meals and leftovers to work or school for lunch. There is plenty of room for two sides and a main entree. The container then fit together and include eating utensils. It all bands together in a neat, small box that fits in most lunch bags/ boxes. It is also leak proof.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I bring this to work everyday for lunch! The bottom is perfect for a half of a bag of a chopped salad and on top I usually put a fruit or veggie and some cottage cheese! I have never had an issue with leaking or anything. I do keep it upright though.
customer_reviews.author: Nick dechiaro

customer_reviews.title: Great seller, and product
customer_reviews.text: this will be my 3rd "Bento All-in-One Stackable Lunch/Bento Box". PROS - I saw "portability and ease of use" and love the "double tiers" gives you many food choice options with the divided upper compartment and built in utensils ... ALL in one handy little "lunchbox". Alot of versatility. GREAT customer svc. - I had an issue with one of my two ordered from this seller ( one of the two "Bento's" arrived with a crack in the lower compartment. I notified SKUniverse Support and a replacement was on it's way and arrived "safely" and with no cracks. GREAT cust. svc. CONS - None ----- > save all that $$ on those plastic sandwich baggies.
customer_reviews.author: Chihuahua Moms

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this one because it seemed to be a good size, and for the most part it is
customer_reviews.text: I decided to finally change up my lunch routine and start making bento for lunch. I ordered this one because it seemed to be a good size, and for the most part it is. I do wish the lids snapped on better, though the strap is key in keeping my box together for my commute to work. I also wish the lids were dishwasher safe like the rest of the box. On the upside my lunch stays together well and looks nice when it's time to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Becky H.

customer_reviews.title: This would have been great if it didn't leak
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. I really did. But it just didn't do what it was supposed to. I bought this to carry lunch to school, but the two halves would come apart in my backpack. The elastic band wasn't able to tightly hold it together, which caused food to spill. This would be great if you carried it in a bag instead of something as roomy as a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Elen

customer_reviews.title: Does not do well after dishwasher cleaning....
customer_reviews.text: This is not one of those "chapter" reviews....Its a great idea but I would not buy again. The strap is not particularly secure. Also... it says dishwasher safe and I would recommend only HAND WASHING as the middle divider that is translucent became a bit warped as well as the cover and it does not really stack any longer. The top is not secure as in...does not snap into place. If you buy it, play around with assembling and disassembling before deciding to keep it....to make sure it will function like you want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Tkay

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for carrier / great service
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the Bentgo stackable lunch box kit for about 4 months. It's a good idea, but the big problem is the containers do not seal. This kit is for dry food and snacks only. Liquid leaks out if the containers are tipped. They are not air tight. Update: I talked with customer service and they indicated my experience is not typical. It's possible the issue was due to using a dish washer even though we used the top rack. They are shipping replacements. I'm very pleased with the responsiveness and service. Hopefully the new kit will work out. The insulated carrier and lunch box kit fit perfectly and leave space for additional items.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Plenty big enough, but middle lid doesn’t snap on
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little lunch box for kids or adults. A lot of the reviews were saying it wasn’t big enough for an adult but I find it to be plenty. I fit a full size sandwich in the bottom with a side of avocado and yogurt and blueberries in the top. Plenty of food. I gave it four instead of five stars because the divider lid does not snap on as I thought it would. No leaks on my first use but I wouldn’t put anything liquid in the bigger bottom portion, as the only thing holding it together is the strap they give you.
customer_reviews.author: iamkatieo

customer_reviews.title: Lids not tight and portion compartments are not spill proof
customer_reviews.text: The two boxes must be used together with elastic band otherwise lids open and food spills. Moreover, one box has compartments for portion size but the food from one compartment goes to other; everything becomes a mess. This has not been used after one time due to reasons I just mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: F. A. A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love using this bento box to pack my lunch instead of using my regular Tupperware. Keeps everything from mixing up and it’s great that it comes with its own utensils so I don’t have to keep bring some from home or buying plastic. It’s also small enough to put in my lunchbox and I can still fit two bottles of water in there.
customer_reviews.author: Jhane Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea but doesn’t do work
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, loved the color, love the size, love the material and the utensils. HOWEVER, here are the things that this product lacks and it’s issues which is why I returned it: 1) the lids don’t close well, 2) it’s not leak proof as it states in the description. I tested it several time and it leaked. 3) You need the strap to make sure everything is closed properly. Therefore, if you lose it you are screwed. You can’t even use the strap to carry the containers, because the containers will slip. 4) utensils don’t lock in the proper location
customer_reviews.author: Martin Luna

customer_reviews.title: Useful, attractive, surprisingly large portion sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Bentgo lunch box two months ago along with theand. I love this box. Every day I put in a wrap sandwich, some salad, and some fruit - unless I feel like getting fancy. The dividers work, the portion sizes in both levels are surprisingly large for such a small box, and the divider with cutlery works great - at first I thought the cutlery wouldn't fit, but it does! This is the perfect lunch box for me to take to work. It holds a lot of food, is easy to clean, the quality is great! And it's cute. Yeah, that matters to me.
customer_reviews.author: Nenni

customer_reviews.title: Ease and Convenience
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves the Bentgo boxes. They are easy for the kids to use and travel with (school and vacations). As a mom, I like how I can put all of the dry goods down low, or a pasta salad, and then use the top two sections for fruit and veggies. We recently took a trip to the beach and the kids put salad on the bottom, and fruits and veggies up top. They had everything they needed all wrapped up in one place. I like too, how it comes with the silverware. It makes it easy for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Oheygiantbeer!

customer_reviews.title: Bento lunch box
customer_reviews.text: I wish the bottom containers top snaped closed but it just sits on there and is held shut when you have both pieces together with the elastic band keeping them tight together but otherwise I do like them overall. I would recommend them to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: glenda townes

customer_reviews.title: Bentgo is the way to GO!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews on products.. although I receive almost daily Amazon deliveries. But this product is the exception! This is the most handy lunch box ever! It is very durable & even dishwasher safe! I have been trying to eat healthier and the Bentgo helps me control the portion sizes that i pack for my daily lunch. In one compartment I put fruits, another i put veggies & the 3rd compartment i put a protein. I think this will even be great for my kids school lunches!!! I need to purchase more! One in every color! I am so impressed by this product, I wish I found it sooner! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: A gift for my boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: This set is quite unique. The fact that silverware fits inside nice and neat is a big bonus. I do wish it were more airtight, as it has leaked a few times. However, that doesn't make him not take it with him to lunch everyday. The compartment sizes are perfect too!!
customer_reviews.author: Josie Posie

customer_reviews.title: A Very Happy Customer !
customer_reviews.text: I have recently received my bentgo lunch box and I can't say enough on just how great these boxes are. Will be going on a road trip real soon and I am so thrilled like a little school girl with her brand new lunch box. My husband is even jealous. I also purchased the little condement holders and an extra band. Just in case. I would give a rating 10 if I could. There just so awesome to have. And it's great for portion control on how much to eat. Perfect size box.
customer_reviews.author: Loving Wife

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but NOT secure
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice looking and you could be forgiving to think it functioned well too. It does not, neither lid is very secure, the middle one simple rests on the larger container. the Top Lid, harder white plastic stopped easily fitting securely after the first day, by this time it's so hard to fit the seal all around it can actually just pop open in some cases. After three months of daily use I don't rely on this system to prevent leaks - it is not a backpack proof lunch box. It is a convenient, attractive set of bowls - functional enough but could be better for travel if I was confident of the contents not leaking or spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great, Small and Portable Lunch Box
customer_reviews.text: Summary: Excellent lunch box. My kids love it and it is the perfect size for their bags. Build: Excellent build quality. All the parts fit snug and in place and there is a rubber(?) gasket around the lids. I have not tested whether these are leak tight but appear to be so. Size: Way to small for me, but great for my kids (elementary and middle school). Using a Mr. Bento as a comparison, this would be about half of that. That said my wife said that it may be enough for her. Use: We place all kinds of fruits and vegetables in one container and then sandwiches/pizza/left-overs in the other
customer_reviews.author: FamilyMan "Don"

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say much if it’s leak proof bc I haven’t used it with liquid foods but for salads, it’s perfect. The utensils included are actually nice too. I use the bottom half most of the time and it holds a good portion of salad to keep me satiated during my work day. Cute and compact. Def recommend if you’re looking for a functional lunch box with no frills.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: It's not 100% secure.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color more then I liked the product. Its nice but wasn't what I expected. To wash is easy, but to assemble it is clumsy. You have to get the hand of it. The band that ties it together isn't good. When washed it smell and it's not 100% secure. Its not worth. I was mad hype. 😑
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these boxes since 2015 and yes there is an issue with the top compartments mixing product as the two compartments don't seal against the top but that is it. The bottom compartment is more than big enough for my lunch and the top allows me to bring other products for lunch as well. I usually bring something to warm in the microwave for lunch and the fact that I can do this and still have cold products in the top compartments works for me. I don't use the included knife, fork and spoon so it doesn't bother me that they slide around.
customer_reviews.author: I. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: I love my Bentgo All-in-One Stackable & I am so glad ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bentgo All-in-One Stackable & I am so glad that I didn't hesitate when I ordered it in my favorite color-purple. It is so far the best food container on the go that I ever own....microwavable, BPA free and very convenient. I will continue buying this brand from now on & I will recommend this to everyone, especially those busy people always on the go. I use it to bring lunch to work almost everyday & I pack my lunch on weekends too now that I own this Bentgo....saves me from buying junk food & fast food lunches. Now I have the choice to pack a healthy lunch. Great product & great brand!
customer_reviews.author: adoracion cortes

customer_reviews.title: Not big for a hungry mans lunch but perfect for most!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely nicer for women. I actually bought this for my son who does construction I really thought it would be probably double the size he says it’s OK but I know it would be starving. For my Daughter any myself absolutely perfect and it looks nice and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not the best design
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but not the best design. Having a strap is cumbersome and there is the possibility of it getting lost. The compartments are large and can fit a good amount of food (I'm using it for our toddler) but they don't lock in place in a way that prevents foods with liquids from leaking out. The utensils are located on the second layer but don't stay in place very well. Overall, it's just okay. We wanted more compartments (this has 3) and something more leak proof so we ended up using something else.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This works for what I wanted, but I didn't expect it to be so small. I wanted something I could use in place of using multiple tupperware/pyrex containers for my lunches, but I'll still have to supplement this for larger/tall foods. I sliced an apple and it took up almost the entire top layer! Also, I have to use the strap to keep everything contained and closed properly. The middle section with the silverware doesn't really allow the box to stack properly.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lunch box!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch box! It had one large compartment and two smaller ones so you can divide up all your food. It’s really convenient to be able to stack it together and hold it together with the elastic that comes with it. I with the fork and spoon were a little more curved since they’re slightly hard to use, the fork is almost straight up and down and the spoon doesn’t have much of a scoop to it, but they work well for what they’re for! I would definitely recommend this lunch box!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: I love this bento box
customer_reviews.text: I love this bento box. I bought it to give as a gift and it's the perfect size for a whole meal or for snacks. The band holds the top and bottom together for bigger meals or they can be used separately. I would suggest this for anyone looking for a way to keep school lunches or work lunches organized. No more paper bags or saran wrap with this bento box! Colors are vibrant too:)
customer_reviews.author: R. Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap, small, and low quality
customer_reviews.text: Had to return after less than a month. After only a couple of days of use, the compartments no longer fit together, which meant there were gaps. Very frustrating trying to put them together before work. The compartments are also VERY SMALL. You can't fit much in them, and a lot of times I had to have extra tupperware/baggies on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: value
customer_reviews.text: so you can't put the white part in the microwave. you can't put anything that has liquid. the elastic band is great but it just looks cute. the top doesn't snap into the bottom. I regret this purchase and stopped using it. way too inconvenient when i'm at work to separate it, cover with a paper towel then heat.....too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: shannon whittington

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of the Bentgo product because 1. It super CUTE and 2. I believe it helps me with my portions. First, I ordered the bentgo lunch box over a year ago and now I ordered the salad container and the classic. The classic was alot smaller than I had expected. Especially in comparison to the Bentgo box plus with they whole "strap action" I was worried that it would leak or come undone. And who has time for that? Lol Anyway so I returned it but Hunnyyyy the salad container however... now THAT was perfect!🥰
customer_reviews.author: Chvani Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use and impossible to close!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand all of these great reviews, I have a feeling that they are fake to boost the rating... This bento box is impossible to snap closed without using judo-chop force, the cutlery does not fit all together on the white plastic cutlery top, and the white plastic cutlery top for the larger container does not stay in place. Also, the partitioned container does not keep food separate as the lid it higher than the partition and the food, if small food like cereal or cut up fruit, shifts between partitions. I think this is a waste of money personally.
customer_reviews.author: JB_From_MD

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily use
customer_reviews.text: Great size for daily lunches in the work place. The utensil storage needs some work, the knife/fork/spoon constantly fall out of the prongs. Also, the upper and lower storage units do not snap together, they are held together by pressure. But it works!
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend to people with big lunches
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how I feel about this container and I’ve been using it for over a month. I personally love the design of it; it’s compact and cute. It fits perfectly in a small fridge or lunchbox. I fit a chicken wrap, blueberries, and half an apple into it with no problem, to give perspective. What I really don’t like about it is that the lids to both compartments don’t snap or close shut completely. It’s fine if you don’t have a lot of food, but if you’re like me and pack big-ish lunches, it won’t close correctly. The bottom and top portions don’t snap together either.
customer_reviews.author: Aleks Kay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and cute
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is awesome and adorable to boot. It works great for bringing lunch to work. My only minor complaint is that the utensils don't lock in to their spots that securely and fall out of place sometimes, but since they're usually between the two stacking layers, it doesn't usually present much of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kurama

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this container. It’s very inconvenient. The lid for the bottom doesn’t click or stay on AT ALL and the lid for the top is almost impossible to snap on. Every once in a while I can get it to snap on but it takes a lot of trying. The elastic band that goes around the outside barely helps to hold the containers together. It is definitely not leak proof. The top compartments are too shallow, can’t fit much in there. Overall, this container is terrible and if I hadn’t opened all the plastic and used it, I would definitely return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ellenberger

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Should have thought about it before i bought it. Too complicated. I bought this for someone for school to put their fruits and pack lunch. The second day she took this to school, she lost 2 pieces. It has 2 covers, 2 bins, a band to gold it together, and 3 utensils. Thats 7 pieces all together. The utensils dont fit in to place after using them. If you lose the stretch band that holds the food bins closed, then you might as well throw all the pieces in the garbage Because the covers do not seal thight--the band holds them closed.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: VERY nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he takes his lunch to work every day. This lunch box is microwaveable and machine washable. It also comes with two dividers at the top, and a large compartment at the bottom. The middle layer is divided by a plastic piece that holds a knife, fork, and spoon. SO handy! At first I was worried this would be too small to fit his lunch (I like to give him large portions because he works long days), but I have found that this may look small, but a LOT can fit in it. I also like the gray color--very professional looking.
customer_reviews.author: Missery@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I bought 3!
customer_reviews.text: Great for adults! I purchased 3 of these Bentgo boxes. They are great! Has a lot of storage! I loved that everything is compact and can get used as separates as well. I am having a little trouble fitting the utensils back in their slots but am working on finding the correct way. My dad and best friend are loving them too! They are great because they fit in small lunch boxes or bags, are microwaveable and dishwasher safe! I purchased the green, blue, and purple. Colors are just as vibrate as in the pictures!
customer_reviews.author: IsLuna

customer_reviews.title: I love this Bento Box
customer_reviews.text: I love this Bento Box. Its just the right size to carry in my bag- not big and bulky- and I love the portion control. Its just enough food to fill me up - and I am not overeating. Washes up beautifully and I like the nesting storage- the fork is useless- the tines are too rounded. and if you don't have them lined up just right- the lid doesn't fit snug. I have plastic silverware at work - so I just leave that out. I would buy this product again - and will likely buy some of its accessory pieces
customer_reviews.author: whatIthink

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Edit: After leaving this review, the company contacted me and was more than understanding. They sent me a letter in the mail, and refunded my purchase. While the container may not have been as good as I was hoping, the company was excellent to work with! I dislike this container. I wanted to love it. It's cute and looks easy to carry. However, the lids stopped connecting to the base after about 2 uses. Now I'm afraid to put anything that could potentially spill in the containers. It also becomes difficult to carry when the lids no longer connect. I will be looking for another bentgo box.
customer_reviews.author: MV_STL

customer_reviews.title: Great set up, but too small
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. A little hard to cut or come up with things to fit into the small spaces. Think it’s a great product, but would suggest buying a bigger version.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kammolongie

customer_reviews.title: Cute but functionally useless
customer_reviews.text: Good idea, terrible execution. It looks cute but is functionally useless. The compartments don't really fit together, so it tends to leak. They don't clasp together at all, rather are only held together by the accompanying band-- which means you have no choice but to carry the entire box, you can't just use 1 compartment at a time. The compartment sizes aren't big enough to fit even half a sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: Caileigh

customer_reviews.title: Leaky.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this Bento box at all. I love the salad one, but these lids do not lock in so it leaks everywhere. The elastic is not enough to hold it together. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Elmo

customer_reviews.title: Good at first, but then........
customer_reviews.text: At first they seemed nice. A little small but good for the right size snack or small meal to take along. Two months later one of the covers will not stay on and the fork/spoon slots will no longer hold the utensils that come with the box. Update: According to the company and product info, the lids are not to be heated, so dishwashing or microwaving lids are to be avoided. Upon hearing my dilemma company reached out to me and made sure I didn't walk away unsatisfied with their product. After owning another set, I can honestly say I am very impressed with both the containers and the company.
customer_reviews.author: D. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say putting the separator between the compartment was a constant struggle and now it doesn't want to close at all. A utility piece that is supposed to be used daily and especially one that comes between you and your lunch should not require this much effort/work and generate this much frustration. If you are planning to use this for Children's school lunch, give it a pass. Unfortunately, my return window has closed.. So my advice is.. even if you are somewhat unhappy or unsure, just return it as it only gets worse over time.
customer_reviews.author: kb-hunter

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Its not a bad product, but if you lose the band, your done. You cant use it anymore, so thats a big dissapointment. It does leak. The band looses elasticity. Wont recomend!
customer_reviews.author: JONATHAN DIAZ PTY 43324

customer_reviews.title: Convinient
customer_reviews.text: I purchased because I eat a few small portion meals throughout my work day. I needed something more compact instead of having different little containers. This became very practical and convenient. I don't like the fact that if I want to use them alone I can't because its not secure and can open.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Pula

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than I expected. I guess it's great for people who portion control but for me, I like to take small amounts of a lot of things and this wasn't the ideal size for me. It is still cute and easy to pack food in without having the box take so much room in my lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Park

customer_reviews.title: high quality, good for small portions
customer_reviews.text: High quality product, but the compartments are so small. I thought this wouldn't be a problem, since I am working on eating smaller portions, but I hardly ever use this container. I usually take big salads to work, and even the bottom compartment is a little small for that. I might use this if I take a wrap to work (bottom), and then some small snacks (top). Also, the lids don't snap on, so they're not going to be good to travel far. If I take it to work and set it in my desk drawer, it is fine like that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really love this lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: I really love this lunchbox. Bought it in two colours for myself and my boyfriend to take lunches to work. Small, compact, aesthetically pleasing and easy to clean. They stack great and I love that you can use just one part for days when you don't have as much lunch to bring with you. It might take some time to learn how to pack a lunch this compact - most American style lunchboxes give you more space but are as a result bulkier and difficult to lug around with you. Having learned how to squeeze everything in, I can just throw this thing in my purse as I head out the door in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: VioletandRyeTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but I like it so far. The lid comes off easy, so the band is a must if you want to keep them together. Container is not flimsy, thats a plus.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.X

customer_reviews.title: Great for to-go lunches
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to use at work and this is one of the best purchases I’ve made on amazon in general. I think the concept is so clever because you can pack a whole lunch in this one container. And it has like to-go silverware in it! I like it way better than tupperware and it’s definitely more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, colors don't fade at all, it has been more than 3 years and still, in very good condition, the only issue is hard to open the cap sometimes:( Love the portion shape and quality...
customer_reviews.author: Kaberdey

customer_reviews.title: Great for school lunches!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 4 year olds lunches, it fits perfectly in her lunchbox, and allows for just the right amount of food for her to eat plenty at lunch time. My only complaint would be that the compartments in the top section aren’t sealed separately so say I put blueberries in one side and grapes in the other, they eventually will mix together. Otherwise it’s super easy to clean, and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: tink

customer_reviews.title: Better off buying sandwich bags
customer_reviews.text: The lids do not snap together or seal. The container can hold a sandwich on bottom and six crackers on top THATS IT. Once the elastic band stretches out i wont be able to "hold" the container together (the elastic does not work well anyway). The Spoon and Fork do not stay in place either the utensils are over sized for the clip that holds it in place. Waist of Plastic and Money.
customer_reviews.author: ProTec

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set, nice colors (mine is green). Unfortunately that's where the good things end. Not only it won't close securely (bottom lid is being hold ONLY with the strap), but the top lid finally simply won't fit own container! All despite the fact that I never ever washed it in the dishwasher. Absolutely useless as it is and is going to the garbage today. Updating: as of 8/22 I've got a complete refund and another set from manufacturer to try. The lids are ok so far in a new set..
customer_reviews.author: notsunami

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED: Not for me, but good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Hate this thing. Lids are hardly airtight, difficult to seal. Divider in the top container doesn’t go all the way to the top, so your foods spill all over each other. Utensils don’t lay flat in their slots making it difficult to even put them in place. **EDIT 8/4** While I still struggled with making this item work for myself, I am happy to report that customer service was excellent and was generous enough to issue a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Lazzari

customer_reviews.title: Healthier lunches
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day for lunch at work. My favorite part about it is how it has positively affected my eating habits. I recently finished school and transitioned to a full time job. I went from having a flexible schedule to plan meals to a 9-5 job and found myself eating out a lot. I was spending a lot of money and eating fast food that wasn't very healthy. I specifically chose Bentgo because I was drawn to the idea of creating a healthy, visually appealing meal. There are so many bento recipes and communities online, I am so glad I bought mine.
customer_reviews.author: portia

customer_reviews.title: Cute for adults work lunch
customer_reviews.text: I bring this to work every day and I feel like it's not too silly or childish. I do wish that at least the bottom compartment was leak proof. If you have anything that has juice beware because it will spill everywhere. I also don't like how you can't just use the bottom or top because you need the band around it or it will fall apart
customer_reviews.author: Alice Hooten

customer_reviews.title: Loose fitting; not secure for food travel.
customer_reviews.text: This is the saddest waste of money I’ve ever had. The containers are not secure so your food will leak, the lids will pop off, the containers slide around and the “rubber band” around it isn’t very secure or strong. The plastic clip on mine broke after its first used. Not only would I not recommend this to anyone I would buy you anything else in lieu of this product. I bought two of them and they’re quickly on their way to the trash after only a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and works well!
customer_reviews.text: This is too cute and works great! It’s incredibly easy to clean. It would be nice to have the bottom pieces actually latch into the top instead of just resting inside of them. It’s not really a problem, as it comes with the elastic, it would just be kind of a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Allen

customer_reviews.title: NOT Leakproof! Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: I would say it is my fault that I did not read the product description carefully. After trying it the first time, I found that it did not work well with a little liquid since I take something with tomato sauce to work. I believe it works with dry foods, such as bread, but that's not the box I want to have. By the way, the top lid and divider lid are not recommended to dishwash (as it says in the Care Note), although I saw they were washed in dishwasher in the video of the product description here. It is not convenient if these two parts cannot go with the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Good Service, Great Box
customer_reviews.text: Used for noodles and rice. The box seals up compact and is great for carrying in a backpack. The bottom container is more leak proof than the top container, but I would avoid liquids. Box came cracked, but it was swiftly replaced with little effort from me. It's real neat.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I really like it becaus ent fits the perfect amount not too much and not too little has a little mess happen because there was too much sauce so it leaked out just a little bit but i use this everyday and have no other problems with it😁
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch box. It is perfect for my work lunches. The different compartments easily adds variety and it is in moderate-healthy portions that way I won't over pack a lunch. I also like how a utensil set it included :3 One issue is that I read in another review that the section that holds the utensils stains, I been careful to avoid that but I packed cabbage soup my first time using it and I saw that it was forming (the dis-coloration) I wiped it off immediately but foods with tomato paste or red colors will definitely stain. Even my little fork was staining :( anyway it shouldn't be too much of a problem if you are careful..
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bariatric Surgery Patients!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been a lifesaver for me. I had bariatric surgery last year and was really struggling with meal preparation on the days I go to work. These are microwave safe, and when you're done they fit neatly inside each other!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Lunch packers friend
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to my daughter she packs her lunch all the time. So I have to ask if it's easy to clean etc. But when she opened it she lived it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Take meals and snacks with you to work? This is for you.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect.little meal carrier. Lunch snacks etc. My wife loves to take her lunch to work ( mostly cause I cook amazing meals) she lives this little handy device.
customer_reviews.author: J.r.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. The utensils are far more durable than ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The utensils are far more durable than I ever expected. I microwave the blue sections with no problems, but haven't really dared to put anything in the dishwasher. Taking a star off because the lid between the sections doesn't go on well. I know it isn't meant to really snap, but it doesn't even want to sit there. Once the strap is on, however, everything sits perfectly and survives in my bag until lunchtime.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor J.

product_meta.title: Bentgo Classic - All-in-One Stackable Bento Lunch Box Container - Sleek and Modern Bento-Style Design Includes 2 Stackable Containers, Built-in Plastic Utensil Set, and Nylon Sealing Strap (Green)
feature_bullets: 2 STACKABLE CONTAINERS: Top container features 2 compartments that each hold 3/4 cups of food while the bottom container holds 2 cups — together they’re perfect for packing a variety of foods in healthy portions
BPA-FREE: Made with food-grade, eco-friendly materials that are microwave, dishwasher, and freezer safe (Note: Do not put center divider in dishwasher or microwave)
COMPACT & EASY STORAGE: Top container nests inside the bottom one for compact & easy storage

PURCHASE WITH A PURPOSE: Bentgo continues to be a proud supporter of Feed the Children, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit that gives hope and resources for hungry children and families. Since 2017, Bentgo has donated more than $200,000 to help put an end to hunger.
WHAT YOU GET: Bentgo Classic lunch container, sealing strap, 3-piece utensil set, user manual, industry-leading 2 Year Warranty, and caring customer support.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars5,988 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
